item.description:
Lucca ( http://www.luccabosto... )is a Northern Italian restaurant named after a town in Tuscany. It serves regional Italian cuisine. The food, service and ambiance are all superb. It's located on the first block of Hanover Street on the left-hand side as you're coming from the Greenway. Prices range as follows: Appetizers: $9-16 Entrees: $23-36. They also have an interesting dessert selection. Our cocktail hour will run from 6:00-7:00 at the bar if you get there before we're seated at 7:00. It should be a memorable evening. Haymarket (Green & Orange Lines) is the nearest T-stop to the North End.

Important: Please access our 'About' tab for further event guidelines. Thank you.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the bar.
item.name: Lucca- Dinner
